advices.advice: Begin making purchases of the baby items on your checklist such as wet wipes, a thermometer, syringe, and washing powder for kids
Organize the things you will take with you to the maternity home
Make a colorful pregnancy collage with your pictures, adding comments, notes, and memorable details
Avoid tight footwear and snug clothing, have some space to breathe
Consult your doctor about the best medication to take in the event of insomnia or nightmares
